component.name: Revenant
component.summary: Electronic document signing with ARX CoSign

description.p: Cross-platform client for signing PDF documents via the ARX CoSign SOAP API (OASIS DSS standard). Works on macOS, Linux, and Windows without requiring a Windows-only CoSign client.

ul.li: Embedded PDF signatures with visual appearance
Detached CMS/PKCS#7 signatures
Pre-computed SHA-1 hash signing
Automatic signer identity discovery from server or signed PDFs
Secure credential storage via system keychain

screenshot.caption: Signing a PDF document with Revenant

ul.li: Add application identifier to sandbox entitlements for TestFlight compatibility
Embed provisioning profile in MAS build for TestFlight and App Store submission
Add Linux ARM64 build support
Automatic Homebrew tap update on release
Rename position presets to Y-first convention (bottom-right, top-left, etc.)
Rename position aliases to match (br, tl, tr, bl, bc)
Fix Windows artifact naming in CI (revenant-windows-x64.zip)
Fix integration tests TLS setup for env-var-only credentials

description.p: Initial alpha release with full signing and verification support.

ul.li: PDF digital signing via CoSign SAPI Web Service (SOAP/DSS)
Embedded visible signatures with customizable appearance
Detached CMS/PKCS#7 signature support
PDF signature verification (embedded and detached)
Cross-platform GUI with sign, verify, and setup dialogs
CLI with sign, verify, check, info, and setup commands
Multi-profile configuration with secure credential storage
Armenian font support (GHEA Grapalat, GHEA Mariam)
Legacy TLS 1.0 transport for EKENG appliance
